summary: Frontend testing completed for SoundMirror Phase 1 features. All core features working correctly: Letter Practice, Word Practice, RecordingStudio, TimelineScrubber, and DualHeadAnimator components.
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed ESLint errors in useMediaRecorder.js - functions were being called before declaration (hoisting issues)
Fixed ESLint errors in useAttemptHistory.js - deleteAttempt was called before declaration
App.js is a large file (~1500+ lines) - consider splitting into separate component files for better maintainability
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Phase 1 features tested and working: (1) Home page loads with suggested words and navigation, (2) Letter Practice page loads with alphabet grid and dual head animator, (3) Clicking letters changes displayed letter and phoneme, (4) Play Sound button triggers animation, (5) Word Practice page loads with RecordingStudio and TimelineScrubber, (6) Timeline Scrubber displays phoneme segments correctly (hello=h,eh,l,o; water=w,a,t,e,r), (7) Start Recording button requests microphone permission (shows 'Requested device not found' in headless browser - expected), (8) Animation plays smoothly with crossfade transitions, (9) Navigation between pages works correctly

home_page.details: Home page loads with SoundMirror branding, suggested words (hello, thank you, water, etc.), Letter Practice and Your Progress cards, navigation works

letter_practice_page.details: Page loads with alphabet grid (A-Z), vowels highlighted in gold (A,E,I,O,U), dual head animator with Front View and Side View, Play Sound button present

letter_selection.details: Clicking letters changes the displayed letter and phoneme (e.g., clicking E shows 'E' with 'eh' phoneme)

play_sound_animation.details: Play Sound button triggers animation, shows 'Ready...' during delay, animation plays and returns to neutral state

word_practice_page.details: Page loads with RecordingStudio (Audio/Video toggle, Start Recording button) and TimelineScrubber components

timeline_scrubber.details: Displays phoneme segments with vowels in gold/amber and consonants in blue. Shows duration (e.g., 0.0s / 0.8s for hello)

recording_functionality.details: Start Recording button requests microphone permission. Shows 'Requested device not found' error in headless browser (expected behavior). Error handling works correctly.

animation_playback.details: Animation plays smoothly with crossfade transitions. Play/Pause buttons work. Speed controls (0.25x, 0.5x, 0.75x, 1x) present.

navigation.details: Navigation between Home, Words, Letters, Progress, Report pages works correctly. Back button works.

mocked_features.microphone_recording: Recording requires actual microphone access - shows error in headless browser (expected)
mocked_features.grading_results: Grading is heuristic-based and requires actual audio recording to test

code_fixes_applied.fix: Reordered function declarations and used inline logic for auto-stop
